@ Nakayuki: I've been thinking the same thing for a while.  It would be nice to have a distinction between the "I hated it at first but now I'm so happy!" rape hentai and the "I hated it and now I'm a broken bird" rape hentai.  "Chikan Densha" is a good example of the first type.  This story leans more into the second, though there are hints of enjoyment.  A strong example of "real" rape hentai (not chikan) would be "Bound Sisters" which has a much crueler tone than either of the other two stories.  They are all rape hentai but there's a huge gap in presentation and tone between each of them.  They appeal to different fetishes and tastes, particularly depending on who the girl is.  Seeing a total bitch broken can be very satisfying to some while others want to see a sweet innocent thing broken and ground under heel.  Some just want to see the girl forced to happily admit that she's now a slut.  What would you call a tag for "rape-the-girl-enjoys" though?
